text:
BREAKING - Schools in FRANCE said they made a TERRIBLE MISTAKE reopening their school system. FRENCH SCHOOLS SHUT BACK DOWN TODAY after COVID-19 infections in the children reach Epidemic proportions!

Is this what’ll happen UNDER THE DEVOS/TRUMP plan to OPEN BACK UP AMERICA?
